titles.title: Workplace Representation Integrity Act

To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require attestation and proof of citizenship or lawful residency from employees seeking labor representation by way of a process other than through a secret ballot election.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E718-719)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
3/29/2007--Introduced.
Workplace Representation Integrity Act - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require attestation and proof of citizenship or lawful residency from employees seeking (except by a secret ballot election) labor representation for purposes of collective bargaining.
